metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3649 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been classified asproblematic. Affected is the function nilfs_new_inode of the filefs/nilfs2/inode.c of the component BPF. The manipulation leads to use afterfree. It is possible to launch the attack remotely. It is recommended toapply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-211992.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
